      • readNextFrame

        public void readNextFrame()
        Description copied from interface: WebSocketConnection
        Reading WebSocket frames after successful handshake is blocked by default in transport level. In order to read the next frame from wire this method should be called.
        Note: This will allow reading frame by frame from the wire. If all frames should be read automatically then startReadingFrames() method should be called.
        Specified by:
        readNextFrame in interface WebSocketConnection

      • startReadingFrames

        public void startReadingFrames()
        Description copied from interface: WebSocketConnection
        Reading WebSocket frames after successful handshake is blocked by default in transport level. In order to start reading WebSocket frames from the wire this method should be called.
        Note: This will allow reading frames automatically from the wire. If frame by frame should be read from the wire readNextFrame() method should be called.
        Specified by:
        startReadingFrames in interface WebSocketConnection

      • stopReadingFrames

        public void stopReadingFrames()
        Description copied from interface: WebSocketConnection
        Stop reading WebSocket frames from the wire.
        Specified by:
        stopReadingFrames in interface WebSocketConnection

      • initiateConnectionClosure

        public io.netty.channel.ChannelFuture initiateConnectionClosure(int statusCode,
                                                                String reason)
        Description copied from interface: WebSocketConnection
        Initiates connection closure. ChannelFuture will complete operation successfully if and only if it receives back a echoed close WebSocket frame from the remote endpoint with the same status code as was written. Also ChannelFuture will not reach operationComplete state until it receives a close WebSocket frame from the remote endpoint. If user does not need to wait for the echoed back WebSocket frame from the remote endpoint, user need to handle it separately.
        Specified by:
        initiateConnectionClosure in interface WebSocketConnection
        Parameters:
        statusCode - Status code to indicate the reason of closure
        reason - Reason to close the connection.
        Returns:
        Future to represent the completion of asynchronous frame sending.
        See Also:
        WebSocket Protocol

      • finishConnectionClosure

        public io.netty.channel.ChannelFuture finishConnectionClosure(int statusCode,
                                                              String reason)
        Description copied from interface: WebSocketConnection
        Finish the connection closure if a close frame has been received without this connection sending a close frame.
        Specified by:
        finishConnectionClosure in interface WebSocketConnection
        Parameters:
        statusCode - Status code to indicate the reason of closure
        reason - Reason to close the connection.
        Returns:
        Future to represent the completion of asynchronous frame sending.
        See Also:
        WebSocket Protocol
